The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Roy Dotson, Sr., Defendant-Appellant.(No. 11268;Fourth DistrictNovember 19, 1970.Asher O. Geisler, of Decatur, for appellant.Basil G. Greanias, State’s Attorney, of Decatur, for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE CRAVEN.
